Name: Swordfish Message Registry
Description: This registry defines the event messages for Swordfish

LowSpaceWarningThresholdTriggered.Description: Indicates that a LowSpaceWarningThreshold has been triggered. For some resource types, adding more capacity may resolve the low space warning. Other suggested resolutions may be provided as OEM data.
LowSpaceWarningThresholdTriggered.Message: The LowSpaceWarningThreshold %1 has been triggered on %2.

LowSpaceWarningThresholdCleared.Description: Indicates that a LowSpaceWarningThreshold has been cleared.
LowSpaceWarningThresholdCleared.Message: The LowSpaceWarningThreshold %1 has been cleared on %2.

SearchFailed.Message: Object %1 not found that matched requested parameters.

NoDefaultValue.Description: Indicates that no default value was set.
NoDefaultValue.Message: No default value has been set for property %1.
NoDefaultValue.Resolution: Assign a default value for the property.

ClassOfServiceOutOfCompliance.Description: Indicates that the class of service is out of compliance.
ClassOfServiceOutOfCompliance.Message: The service level requirements of the %1 class of service are out of compliance.
ClassOfServiceOutOfCompliance.Resolution: Resolution dependent upon class of service and resource type.

LineOfServiceOutOfCompliance.Description: Indicates that the line of service is out of compliance.
LineOfServiceOutOfCompliance.Message: The service level requirements of the %1 line of service are out of compliance.
LineOfServiceOutOfCompliance.Resolution: Resolution dependent upon line of service and resource type.

OutOfCompliance.Description: Indicates that the service level requirements are out of compliance.
OutOfCompliance.Message: The service level requirements of %1 are out of compliance.
OutOfCompliance.Resolution: Resolution dependent upon service level and resource type.
